about_the_game:
In the year 2090 of a certain world, during the high-pressure period when society was on the verge of collapse many times, "I" was tired of it.
"I" bought an expensive backup slot, and after the refactoring technology became public, "I" found myself a lucky reconfigurator
From now on, the "I" protoplasm will fulfill all my obligations to survive in these terrible times, will the replica that is no different from me be able to achieve what I want in the future?

Return to the group - Remote fire

Who are you? On the ground only your data is intact
I doubt you, but you're not lying, and I'll tell you what happened after that, even though we missed a lot of time
The world is destroyed, the local wars of the high-pressure period after you upload the backup are over, and the world enters a period of peace but extreme tension

The Second Cold War

That's because of the emergence of new types of strategic weapons, and we secretly built the "Haruko" in this early stage, escaped from the earth, and returned almost a hundred years later
Yes, we were the only reconfigurables in the organization at the time over such a long period of time
The leader's prediction was right, the weapon was activated, and we came back to rebuild
But it's not going well, you bring the gun first
We have gone too soon, there are enemies there that are much stronger and more advanced than us

Serve "me".

With the support of the super-artificial intelligence Sigma Project "Static Electricity", which can control the tank's main gun to directly hit jet fighters, it will fight against the ground-effect unmanned weapon carrier aircraft that has completely replaced human infantry by the end of the 21st century
Stick a shotgun to the target when an enemy is approaching, or anchor the target and launch the spear with a hydraulic device
Correct the technical gap of the remote fire team in parallel time, improve the technical level in the exploration, and increase the cost of research return
Combat with vehicles by changing the walking map and class
Use items such as raw cola and mangosteen alcohol to enhance your basic stats
Instead of using medical actions to deal with injuries in everyday behaviors such as combat, the damaged area is repaired to the exact same as the backup by "refactoring", but if there is a disease or data loss before the backup...

Do you know? What has been working against you all this time may be everything in this world
Welcome to a world that is about to be cut off

?? organization


Why live in the past, because I don't have a future, perfectionism is imperfect, and it is also unequal for you to be forced to accept it for the sake of equality, I apologize to you, this is to cut off all suffering
The beginning is for the same ending, but I still can't let go of the process, is that what you want? Also, it's not my fault

??? association


We will do it, any dangerous research will be eradicated as soon as possible, there will be no omission, at least better protection of the present
Those who enjoy the fruits of technology will not understand us, because technology pollutes our water sources, destroys our arable land, and brings us wars and landmines

??? Design Bureau


That would be the end for everyone, should science really be so fast to this extent, as the only individual who is still the only one, I still have more selfish intentions that I want to achieve...
I don't know how many of those people are left, but the mentor is no longer there... It's the only point I have to destroy everything those people want to "protect".




But don't expect anything, this thing is half-baked in every way
